publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1769 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIsâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the following instruments be approved: the draft Advice and Assistance (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 and, the draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 and, the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2001 and, the draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2001 and, the draft Limited Liability Partnerships (Scotland) Regulations 2001. Supported by: Euan Robson*
